alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 4:57PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...LOCALIZED HEAVY RAINFALL WILL IMPACT LANAI IN MAUI COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM HST... At 455 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong area of heavy rain near Lanai City, or 27 miles west of Kahului, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Rainfall rates of between 1 to 2 inches. Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized minor flooding. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lanai City, Manele, and Lanai Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Any localized storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward
